body: Just wanted to come here to say she's not tomboy. Also pretty pedo like so I'm outta here.
lolicon has gone to suck ass in the last five years.
Short hair does not a Tomboy make. There was nothing about "her" that said tomboy except she had short hair. Seemed pretty girlie to me especially that last page.

To all innocent souls that have stumbled into this comment section, If you are reading this, you are immune to all current or future curses on this site. Copy and paste this to 5 other manga, so others may be saved as well. I'm doing this to help y'all out. Stay safe everyone.
Oh god I hope this series continues forever. So this one is a shota who turns into a loli? He was never an adult? HNNNNNGGGHHH more please
